name: Responsible-gaming
body:
## Introduction This project is meant for those who want to create an API with DDD principles in mind.
It is separated in layers and, within each layer, the responsibilities are grouped in folders. ## Project structure The **Api layer** does all the work around resources.
If you look at the controllers, you will see that each controller represents a resource.
You will also see that each resource can support multiple Http Verbs (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) The **Application layer** does all the work around intents.
Intents are reflected as requests in the code and there could be many as our application needs. The **Domain layer** does all the work around models (aggregates in DDD)
